GSD.description:
perf hist: Fix memory leak of a perf_hpp_fmt

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.220 by commit 24a139c105fa0f7f99888cf328bf6a02fc841675. For more details please see the references link.
